channel.title: Adding Guthans special to a server?
channel.description: Yeah can someon e help me add guthans special to my server like it heals and all. Thanks will appreciate greatly.

item.title: Adding Guthans special to a server?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

if (playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4724 && playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4728 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4730 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4726) { PkingDelay = 6; if (misc.random(5) == 1) { gfx(398); NewHP += hitDiff; if(NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); } }

Read full topic
item.source: Adding Guthans special to a server?

item.title: Adding Guthans special to a server?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

public void guthan() { if(misc.random(2) == 1) { stillgfx(398, EnemyY, EnemyX); sendMessage("You drain your opponents health."); NewHP += hitDiff; if(NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) { NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); } } }

Thats all im spoon-feeding you.
